website_summaries.verdict: This oven stands out for its feature set, as well as the fact that it can cook a pizza with just the push of a button.
pros: Heats up fast and cooks a pizza in under 10 minutes
Also works well for foods such as fries and wings, as well as for reheating foods
Includes features such as an LED display, a simple to use timer, and one-touch cooking
cons: No window, so you can't keep an eye on your food as it cooks
Oven gets really hot when it is on
Some buyers said that this option cooks unevenly because of the way the heating elements are positioned

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our basement, we enjoy having pizzas with the kids in the theater room.
customer_reviews.author: Khristy Dorau

customer_reviews.title: Oven work great!
customer_reviews.text: Oven work great! nice to set the time and temp. Kicks out thin crust in 7-8 minute cycles. Great to take it outside during the summer so the oven does not heat up the house or on the boat to feed a crowd quick and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sloop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Cooke a thin crust 12 inch pizza to perfection in 10 minutes at 425 degrees. Couldn’t ask for a better pizza oven. Can’t wait to use it on more food options.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: This pizza oven made my life better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven for the mini bar area that I am designing in my basement. (Make sure you have 3 inches of clearance on either side of this oven if you are designing a cabinet to fit!) I just made a 4-meat Tombstone pizza in it for the maiden voyage. PERFECTION. I know it's only a Tombstone pizza, but the crust was perfect, the cheese was perfect ... not much else to say. Controls are simple, and it comes with a nice manual with a few recipes to try.
customer_reviews.author: Redwing Black

customer_reviews.title: good pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty good pizza oven, easy to use, works like it should, and once you get the temp and timing down for the frozen pizza brand you use, its a breeze no brainer then, its a little pricey compared to other kitchen gadets, but considering we use it all the time, it was worth paying for in the long run, I use it on the patio so not to heat up the kitchen, real handy if you eat a lot of pizzas all year long,
customer_reviews.author: DSWhite

customer_reviews.title: Works like the ones in the bars!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pizzas turn out perfect. Cooks sandwiches and heats up fried foods great too. Much better than the cheap version I bought. This is well worth the money. I do admit one side cooks a bit hotter, but I just turn it about 3 minutes before timer is up, but really I wouldn't have to, I just like it to be perfect. I have tried 4 different types of cookers for pizza, this is by far the best! Love it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this. It has the thermostat to adjust temps. We cook pizzas mostly but good for most anything. Sturdy and very well made. Due to the hot temps in Arizona this works well to use outside and not heat up the house. You will love it !
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: ON SECOND UNIT .READ MY COMMENTS THEM MAKE YOUR CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I have bought for the price it works.as I said this is the second one I have purchased. THE FIRST ONE BURNED A HOLE INTO MY COUNTER TOP .BEWARE SO WITH THE SECOND UNIT I PUT A TRAY UNDER IT TO KEEP ANY HEAT FROM DAMAGING MY COUNTER TOP. Do it to be safe otherwise. It works just fine if anyone wants to see pictures of what could happen I'll upload them to this site.
customer_reviews.author: leo banks

customer_reviews.title: Great oven and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: We use it to make pizza and bake food when the air conditioner is running. Our gas oven heats up the house too much. This heats up in about 5 minutes and bake a California pizza in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DON MICKEN

customer_reviews.title: Terrible temp control. WILL NOT come up to temp.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this thing that even when it didn't seem to work right, I kept giving it the benefit of doubt. It takes longer to come up to it's set temp than it does to cook an item...sort of. (A pizza that states 400/12mins takes 24 mins at 450.) I really wish I\d returned it. It's useless
customer_reviews.author: tiff t

customer_reviews.title: There is an element top and bottom so the crust is crispy and the unit is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: How incredible to be able to bake pizza, bread, pies, and all kinds of other things without heating up the kitchen. In our area the over never gets turned in the summer but now I can do anything I want. There is an element top and bottom so the crust is crispy and the unit is easy to clean. We use it on a metal table in the garage and is no more difficult than using the barbecue. Actually it is a whole lot faster and more efficient. Would buy one again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sustich

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking when I turned it out, smelled like plastic
customer_reviews.text: What can I say more than the title? This product will start smoking when you plug it in. I ended up just using my conventional oven and putting bricks in it. This product is as complex as an easy bake oven. It also will probably trip your breaker. They added warning that it's going to smoke too, that's totally unacceptable, and I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best one we have found
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these in July of 2017 after we decided to discontinue the popular "Heggies" brand and venture on our own path in the pizza game. So we wanted to upgrade our equipment and got these. We go through 200-300 pizzas a month in these and we haven't had one issue with either one of them. Worth the extra money over the cheapies.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pizza oven from Wisco. Our first one lasted a decade. We love it and cook more than just pizza in it. It is big enough to fit a Papa Murphy's cheese wheel and all frozen pizzas we have tried. This new version has temperature control you can set to almost any temperature you'd like unlike the last oven we had that only had two preset temps. Hopefully, this one lasts us just as long as the last one!
customer_reviews.author: Jenevra

customer_reviews.title: Door does not close flush to the unit
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived in time for Father’s Day, but disappointed with the door. Does not close flat against the unit. Searched other reviews and photos, but did not see others with the problem. Will reach out and see what can be done, but don’t want to have to return it...my daughter wants to make pizza for her dad on Father's Day.
customer_reviews.author: John McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great little "frozen pizza" oven.
customer_reviews.text: Very decent oven especially for the price. This unit is used in a small bar solely to cook "thin" crust frozen pizzas - nothing fancy but it does a great job. We have been using this daily for about 4 months and no issues - almost dummy proof and relatively easy to clean. The top of the oven can get pretty hot so definitely don't put anything on top that might melt (safety tip: should probably reinforce that warning with family and staff as well haha).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't we buy this year ago?
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic we stopped eating out - our favorite thing was to get a pizza and have some wine. we LOVE this pizza oven, it cooks pizza entirely different than our normal oven, it takes it to restaurant level - crispy crust, golden cheese, piping hot to perfection. The only thing we wondered, is why we didn't guy this sooner?! Its AMAZING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have used several pizza ovens over the years. This time, we tried a little more expensive model. Basically works the same so we will have to see if it last longer than other more reasonable models. After using this for several months, we vote yes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: We're selling pizza now!
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were 2 separate controls for temperature and timer. It's frustrating when you're busy and hit the button again by mistake and have to start over or worse, don't realize you hit it and it resets to zero. Other than that, it's great. We love being able to sell pizzas now. Love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement oven.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement and so happy I did. So many more things this one can do, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schettl

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad delivery.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it was delivered in a banged up box and when I removed it the front right leg was knocked off. I use a nut as a spacer to level unit and all is right with the world. But this is the second time I received stuff banged up. Do better Amazon , one more and I'm through!
customer_reviews.author: wayne joseph spiker

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, warms quickly. Makes great pizza. Put tin foil on drawer that catches crumbs, make your life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oven. Settled on this one rather than some ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome oven. Settled on this one rather than some cheaper models and couldn't be more satisfied. Oven is easy to use, love the quick on to 450 for 10 min cooking time, great for frozen pizza's. Can easily adjust time and/or temp with a push and turn of the dial. Easy for my kids to fix themselves a snack. The results are much better than using the microwave when you want to create a crunchy exterior like on chicken nuggets, also great for reheating. No need to preheat and with the elements so close to the food, it cooks faster than traditional oven.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: No shipping box.
customer_reviews.text: The oven came in its original box with no outside box. Product box has a big hole and tear across the middle. We taped it for return. Also, both pullouts were bent and did not close tightly. Never, plugged it in. Sent it back immediately. It is a nuisance to package it up and send back.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Lewison

customer_reviews.title: Bottom crust not cooked
customer_reviews.text: Pizza does not cook on the bottom. Olga from wisco industries told me that she would send me another oven. Sent one back already cause the door didn't close right. I hope the next one works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: tim orr

customer_reviews.title: Works great  so far
customer_reviews.text: What's great, however there is one thing I should mention when cooking pizzas you should give the pizza a 1/2 turn half way thru cooking time because it does seem to cook one side little quicker than the other
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: You Gotta have space for it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first one back because it kept turning itself off but they shipped me a replacement very quickly. The handle assembly was a little tricky and could use more specific instructions. It operates with a timer. Taste better than regular oven pizza, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Turuc

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pizza oven but not only subject to pizza. Cooks everything evenly and fast and gives food that restaurant quality.. Just get it and try for yourself. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roche

customer_reviews.title: Prefect table top oven
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wisco oven so far! Works great and so easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Randi berntsen

customer_reviews.title: Only brand we use!
customer_reviews.text: Run a small bar and at the end of a busy night we put out a lot of pizzas and these keep up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pizza oven and the 421 is better than my previous oven. The digital display with multiple temperature and timer settings. Works very well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jjen62

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use for frozen and fresh baked pizza. Also for other items I do not need the oven for so great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Love This Wisco 421 Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this Pizza Oven! I have a small Bar and I sale lots of Pizzas and this Oven is the Perfect Oven cause it Cooks Pizzas Perfect every time and my customers Loves The Pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Cooks!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a professional pizza oven. I intentionally chose this model because it can accomodate a deep dish pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Player

customer_reviews.title: Only made one Pizza but make all kinds of other things
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this to a few people. Rock Solid and funny I've only cook one pizza in it. It's great for making fish wings and all kinds of other things
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Not only does great job on pizza but lots of other things. With temperature control can cook so many other things just like a small oven.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Bartells

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy to control Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic oven. Fast, hot, easy to control. What else could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son as a Christmas present. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a Christmas present. It is what he wanted, since he lives in the basement of a friends house and does not do much cooking. Works very well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann Bingen

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Oven Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable thermostat makes it great for reheating too. It's made in Wisconsin, top quality; I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Love this item.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these. I use them outside and left the last Wisco out in the weather, which ruined it. It does bake pizzas great and after buying a cheaper model, I went back to the Wisco and ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven is awesome. We had a rotating one before and it would never cook pizza evenly. Pizza comes out of this oven crispy and hot! And you can cook so many other foods in it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Florence

customer_reviews.title: Well Built!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oven almost every day for over a year and a half and it still works great. It is a well built oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect pizza every time , auto timer makes life better as well. Toy can cook MA y food iteams in this versatile oven . Dosent take up much space and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: richard r ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: No directions
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was some explanation how to machine works. Because when you put on trey or anything top burns and bottom doesn't cook at all. And when you don't use trey on bottom it works on frozen pizza but not on dough.
customer_reviews.author: Melih Ozbek

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love this Pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean. I have been cooking other items besides just pizza. Anything you put in the oven at a high temperature and don't want to heat up the entire kitchen, use this oven. If it fits use it! It also cooks faster.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S. Gates

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month it is still cooking perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month it is still cooking perfectly. I have cooked pizzas, french bread, reheated french fries, and naan bread and they turn out great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Andre

customer_reviews.title: Heat curing oven
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a heat curing oven for baking enamel paint finishes on metal. Accurate temps and easy use. Space saver on countertop.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good oven for a 12 inch pizza
customer_reviews.text: This oven does a good job, the only draw back is the pizza needs to be cooked in a pan that is NO larger than 12 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, huge elements! Not like the ones with chicken wire elements. Timer is so easy to use and the whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: it's great. A little loud while cooling
customer_reviews.text: Once u get past the fact that top and bottom heating elements are always on and u can't switch them off individually, and there's no window to check in your food, it's great. A little loud while cooling down
customer_reviews.author: Homer J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Wisco 421 Pizza Oven, LED Display
customer_reviews.text: Works great very happy with it easy to set time and temperature control,,love it
customer_reviews.author: Harry L

customer_reviews.title: easy to heat
customer_reviews.text: love having in our shop to have pizza anytime, heats up fast and cooks great
customer_reviews.author: Karla Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I have bought one for all my kids as I have one
customer_reviews.author: glizty grandma

customer_reviews.title: Nice little oven for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little oven for the money! I put a pizza steel in and after preheated for 10 min you can bake perfectly browned and crispy pizzas every 5-6 min, totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It cooks pizzas great and in less ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It cooks pizzas great and in less time than the oven. It's also good for other oven items especially if you don't want to heat up your oven for one or two smaller finger food items.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: works great- no issues so far. my last one with mechanical timer finally died (timer) and got this one. hoping for similar longevity
customer_reviews.author: Cleatus

customer_reviews.title: Books great!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks more than pizza. Everything comes out great without heating up big oven.
customer_reviews.author: William Fishburn

customer_reviews.title: It a great oven.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one and my husband bought it for me. I love it. The way it crisps up a pizza is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves hers no preheating an oven
customer_reviews.text: Returned cuz found out my new stove works the same
customer_reviews.author: Barb Hess

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item as a birthday present for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a birthday present for my husband. He eats frozen pizzas everyday (it's his thing). I was nervous because he is very very particular about how his pizza is cooked. Long story short, he absolutely loves it. He has used it for the last three months everyday. This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. Bruessard

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a local veterans club. It's working well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great for pizza
customer_reviews.text: I thought temperatures stays ones You starting to cook. I didn’t like. And I didn’t think how the oven works. Other than works great. But you have to reheat every time continuous cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Penbe Ozgurgen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pizza oven and a awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Seller was amazing to deal with and very responsive. Wish all sellers where like this one. Pizza oven is awesome. 6 stars for both. Heats up fast and was great for reheating our personal pizzas at Tampa bay veg fest. They came out crispy and evenly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Reviews | The Social Introvert

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small Consession stand You can cook more than just pizza in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pizza
customer_reviews.text: I always by wisco brand. This 421 oven is awesome. The only one I will use in my frozen pizza business. I buy so many of them how about give me a break on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oven works great and use it all the time the only problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Oven works great and use it all the time the only problem I've had is the handle keeps coming loose and I cannot keep it tight
customer_reviews.author: Robin Redel

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my recently opened wine bar and I absolutely love it. It works wonderfully and has been easy to use and clean, plus it cooks a great flatbread!
customer_reviews.author: Katie King

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great...heats up fast..cooks evenly. Have only used it for pizza right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Exellent oven!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I eat homemade pizza alot, this pizza oven is fantastic, heats up very quick,it heats evenly top and bottom, makes the crust crisp,you can heat anything up in it or toast anything quickly, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: We use this oven daily at work. It is great. We cook all kinds of stuff in it besides pizza like duck breasts wrapped in bacon, chicken wings, garlic bread, warm up leftover steak, and on and on.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality and simplicity of use. Cooked a homemade pizza on cast iron and it came out great. It compared favorably to my kitchen oven with stones and my outdoor pizza grill.
customer_reviews.author: Armando L.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven turned defective in a very short time of buying it. Amazon will not except us to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: This is my second oven from Wisco. Great oven. Love being able to control the temperature on this one. Cooks everything.
customer_reviews.author: BJ-S Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cook as evenly as I like but it does work pretty well once you learn ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cook as evenly as I like but it does work pretty well once you learn the timing. We cook frozen pizzas in it by setting the timer to 10 min, 500 degrees and immediately throwing the pizza in without waiting for it to preheat. If the oven is already hot, subtract 3 min. The handle does constantly loosen over time so high temp thread locker is recommended to solve that problem. The unit itself using very thin stamped stainless. It works well enough but makes it feel cheap. A pizza stone for cooking your own pizzas is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CameronC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was given to the fire station in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Works good cooks pizza's evenly
customer_reviews.text: Contol knob is more durable then previous models that had small control pad
customer_reviews.author: charles a bertoldi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I've wanted a pizza oven for many years. This one is very easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great oven for concession trailer. Heats up well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Mentesana

customer_reviews.title: Pizza!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and not just for pizza! Just like any oven you still need to preheat or just cook a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: Willir2

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended oven!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding pizza oven. Cooks the pizza perfectly with little effort. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Monteon

customer_reviews.title: J'ai ete tres content de realiser que ce four parvient ...
customer_reviews.text: J'ai ete tres content de realiser que ce four parvient a faire cuire une pizza surgelee parfaitement, a savoir qui reussit a bien cuire la pate du centre de la pizza sans en bruler la surface.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Oven.
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza oven, this is the 3rd one I have owned. Lost one in a divorce the other 2 are at my house and cabin. Both working excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Krukow

customer_reviews.title: Bakes a frozen pizza very fast!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping! Heats up very fast! Love how it cooks a pizza. Very easy to clean. Should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: T Jepson

customer_reviews.title: better then putting oven on
customer_reviews.text: Use it for every thing, better then putting oven on.
customer_reviews.author: christopher odell

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven for pizza
customer_reviews.text: Great little oven for pizza, it takes about 20.minutes, 10 for warmup and 10 for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: jcd-apple

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. If you cook multiple pizzas you must reduce the cook time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pizza every time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pizza every time! Couldn't be happier with the service or performance. A real winner for this rural part of the country where there aren't too many pizza places within close proximity. Homemade pizza or a quick pizza from the market works wonders on those cold nights. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Pal

customer_reviews.title: What a great little oven
customer_reviews.text: Have had this oven in my personal bar for several months now. Have made over 50 pizza's, hamburgers wrapped in foil, and many hot dogs. What a great little oven.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking
customer_reviews.text: One year old. Worked okay for a while. Now it heats pizzas very unevenly and it's very difficult to try to open the oven to rotate the pizza for better cooking. Top and sides get hot. We used to use once a week, now we just use the kitchen built-in oven again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GWats

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.  Simple and the pizza comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my man cave/garage. It works perfect. The pizza comes out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Concession stand must have
customer_reviews.text: We use these at our concession stands to cook 4 individual 5'' pizzas. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great piza oven. Or for chicken wings, etc..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pizza maker, chicken wings, etc. Professional looking, and awesome performance. Totally recomended!
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiano

customer_reviews.title: Good controls - seems robust.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, have to clean more than my previous unit - not sure why. Like having options for temperature and turning it off without unplugging it. Also has a fan or something that runs when done to help cool it down.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, glad I didn’t settle for the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kakuske

customer_reviews.title: Well designed!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on frozen pizzas and melting cheese on sandwiches and fries. A low budget salamander!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza oven for my she shed I use it for pizza, mozzarella sticks, chicken nuggets cooks great every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our kitchen at Wayne's Corner Café in Stanwood, WA.
customer_reviews.author: W. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the digital controls and ability to change cooking temps.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Kenseth

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven for the money
customer_reviews.text: We are using it for pizza and it is easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza oven you'll ever use
customer_reviews.text: Cooks the pizza very well can't go wrong buying one of these
customer_reviews.author: Adam William Hathorn

product_meta.title: Wisco 421 Pizza Oven, LED Display
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1This is not your typical pizza oven. With one simple push, your digital LED display is automatically set for 10 minutes at 450°F. Need more or less time at a different temperature? Not a problem! Our new rotary dial design allows you to easily set it at what you need with just a turn of the dial. Did we mention it does more than just pizza? Get creative! You’ll be amazed at what you can make in this oven.
